summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5544 for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 200 feet west of 36th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71476, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
